Module com.example.inventory_management_system
Package Controller

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddProductScreenController, ModifyPartScreenController, ModifyProductScreenController
public class MainScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class contains control logic for the Main Screen, which is used to add, modify, or delete parts and products in the inventory. It also contains a feature to search by part/product ID or name.

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> searchPartsByName(String searchName)

      Parameters:
      searchName - User input entered into partSearch text field
      Returns:
      Returns a list of matching parts

    • searchParts

      public void searchParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Calls either the above searchPartsById or searchPartsByName methods, depending on data type of user search input.
      Parameters:
      event - User input entered into partSearch text field

    • productNotFoundError

      public void productNotFoundError()
      Displays an error message if no products are found matching the user search input in the productSearch text field.

    • searchProducts

      public void searchProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - User input entered into productSearch text field

    • isInteger

      public static boolean isInteger(String userInput)
      Checks if user input in search bar is a string or integer.
      Parameters:
      userInput - User input entered into partSearch or productSearch text fields
      Returns:
      Returns true if user input is an integer, or false if it is not

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the MainScreenController and populates the Parts and Products TableViews.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve paths for the controller's root object, set to null if unknown
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, set to null if object was not localized
